A. The Executive Director, in consultation with the Treasurer,

of the Board of Directors. This budget will be administered
by the Executive Director with the advice and counsel of the
Executive Committee. The Executive Director shall submit to
the Board of Directors periodic reports of expenditures,
together with projections of estimated future expenditures,

1. The Board of Directors, by unanimous vote, removed from this
statement of assignments the following paragraph from the
Executive Committee^ original. (This did not indicate
disagreement with the instruction, however, but rather the
feeling that the Board*s attitude about this could better
be expressed informally than through a formal statement:)
"The Executive Committee recommends that the Executive
Director visit member institutions only in the course of
business trips taken primarily for other authorized purposed,
and that he assign to such trips a lower priority of
importance than the performance of the headquarters function
outlined elsewhere in this statement. When he does take such
trips he shall make reports to the Board of Directors as to
his itineraries and observations."
